tagline: A jQuery plugin to display text as if was typewriter.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
jquery.typer.js
===========================

A jQuery plugin to display text as if was typewriter.

### Getting Started

Include jQuery and the plugin on a page. Then call the `typer` method on
selector with text (prefered paragraph and span).

```
<script src="jquery.js"></script>
<script src="jquery.typer.js"></script>
<script>
  $("selector").typer();
</script>
```
